page.title: 05Victoria Park activities
page.content: {Recreation:Victoria Park activities Victoria Park is used by young and old.Recreational activities include bowling greens, tennis courts and a playground.The bowling greens are used frequently by men and women.We asked spectators some questions about the park and we found out from them that it was ideal surroundings for bowls, for company and that it was a very beautiful park.The playground area of the park had in it a rocket,two merry go rounds,swings, climbing frames, tennis courts and playing fields.The tennis courts are all hard and the schools that mainly used them were Streatham and Merchant Taylors'. There is a Pavilion in the Park where pensioners have clubs.In the Pavilion is a dart board,a piano and a radio.Pensioners play cards and other games.
